void Line::delPossibility (  short unsigned int  myP,
Cell &  cell
)  throw (logic_error)
 

Removes a given value from the possibilities list of every cell in the Line but a given cell.

Removes the given value from the possibilities lists if it's in there. If a given value is not within [1,9], we won't even try to delete it.

  • myP the value to remove
  • cell Cell reference to the cell not to update
    Exceptions:
    logic_error Thrown if no possibility is left in any of the cells

bool Line::isPossible (  short unsigned int  myP,
Cell &  cell
)  const
 

Returns wether a given value is possible in at least one of the cells of the Line, without testing the given cell.

If the value is out of the range [1, 9] it returns directly false.

  • myP the value to test
  • cell Cell reference to the cell not to check
    Returns:
    flase if the given value is in not possible in any other cell in the Line.
